item.description:
Lets tramp around the Ossipee Mountains! Mount Roberts (2582 feet tall) is a moderate  hike located near Lake Winnipesauke in New Hampshire. It is the westernmost peak in the Castle in the Clouds complex in the Ossipee Mountains. While the summit features strong views to the north, perhaps the most scenic portion is the ledge area along the Mt. Roberts Trail.  Mt Roberts is on the 52 with a view List

This hike is in the Castle in the Clouds Conservation area that is managed by the Lakes Region Conservation Trust - website (www.lrct.org). 

We will hike the Mt. Roberts Trail which has great views from several ledge outlooks to the summit of Mt. Roberts.  From there we will continue along the High Ridge Trail to the Faraway Mountain outlook, then decent via the Faraway Mountain and Cold Spring Trails to Cold Spring Road and back to the parking lot.

CARPOOL TIME 8:30  EXIT 23 I93

 Directions to trailhead: Take Route 109 South from Route 25. Bear left onto Route 171. Shortly thereafter, take a left onto Ossipee Park Road. The small hiker parking lot is located just after the gatehouse, on the right. Continue on the road on foot, taking a left at the intersection. The Mt. Roberts Trail trailhead is located at the corner of the field near the barn.

Weather permitting, a family hike will be posted 1 time a month

Family hikes should be in small groups, keeping the hike shorter, you never know if child #2 will suddenly want to quit.......an after hike treat stop usually keeps the feet moving. For this event any parents with small children can return to the starting point after the summit. Consider young hikers get colder/hotter quicker, keep them dry, fed & hydrated, watching out for blisters before they become an issue.

For family hikes, the kids set the pace and of course, their parents are always in control. Parents know their children best. No goals or agendas Just have fun.

Location will be decided by the attendees. Hike by the hour and set a modest turn around time so the younger hikers can finish happily.
item.how_to_find_us: CARPOOL TIME 8:30 EXIT 23 I93 Meet in the parking lot diane's mobile/ text 603-477-5116
item.name: Mt Roberts and Mt Faraway Loop Intermediate pace Family/Photo/Dogs 8.2 mi
